Operating~system 
successfully~loaded.
Data~extraction
\hspace*{1ex}program~starting...}}}}}

\naput{<30 sec.}
\nbput{Automatic}

\nbput{Automatic}

\ncarc{->}{Status}{Permission}
\naput{Green}

\naput{Red}

\naput{Green}

\ncarc{->}{Status}{Shutdown}
\naput{Red}

\hspace*{2ex}want to shutdown?
All files will save. 
No~~~~~~OK,~Shutdown}}}}}

\ncarc{->}{Shutdown-Confirm}{Status}
\naput{Red}

\ncarc{->}{Shutdown}{Shutdown-Confirm}
\nbput{Green}

\rput[tl](-.5,13.5){\ovalnode{FromFig2A}{From Fig. \ref{fig:Menu2}}}
\ncarc{->}{FromFig2A}{Shutdown}

\rput[tl](11,6.5){\rnode{Shutdown-Sequence}{\ref{enu:Shutdown-Sequence}:\psframebox{\parbox{\widthof{\texttt{12345678901234567890}}}{\texttt{%
Please do not unplug
while shutdown is in
\hspace*{6ex}progress.\\*
\hspace*{3ex}Please wait...}}}}}

\ncarc{->}{Shutdown-Confirm}{Shutdown-Sequence}
\naput{Green}

\rput[tl](11,3){\rnode{Shutdown-Complete}{\ref{enu:Shutdown-Complete}:\psframebox{\parbox{\widthof{\texttt{12345678901234567890}}}{\texttt{%
\hspace*{1ex}Shutdown Complete
\\*

\hspace*{2ex}Ready to Unplug}}}}}

\ncarc{->}{Shutdown-Sequence}{Shutdown-Complete}
\naput{Automatic}
\nbput{<35 sec}

as enumerated in Section \ref{sec:Menu-Screen-Descriptions}}
\end{figure}



\section{Menu Screen Descriptions\label{sec:Menu-Screen-Descriptions}}
\begin{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:Startup}Startup screen is shown on boot.
\item \label{enu:Execute}Program loading screen
\item \label{enu:Status}Status screen

\begin{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:StatusA}No vehicle Connected
\item \label{enu:StatusB}Controller Area Network (J1939)
\item \label{enu:StatusC}J1708
\item \label{enu:StatusD}Both CAN and J1708
\end{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:Shutdown}Shutdown

\begin{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:Shutdown-Confirm}Shutdown Confirm
\item \label{enu:Shutdown-Sequence}Shutdown Sequence
\item \label{enu:Shutdown-Complete}Shutdown Complete
\end{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:Permission}Permission Screen
\item \label{enu:Upload-to-Server}Upload to Server

\begin{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:UploadA}Internet is ready
\item \label{enu:UploadB}Internet is not ready
\end{enumerate}
\item Change IP network settings

\begin{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:NetworkA}Disabled
\item \label{enu:NetworkB}Enabled
\item \label{enu:DHCP}Field use only
\end{enumerate}
\item \label{enu:GPS-Status}GPS Status Display. \end{enumerate}

\end{document}
